reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 195/02: RENEWAL OF DRIVING INSTRUCTOR'S LICENCES
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 195/02: RENEWAL OF DRIVING INSTRUCTOR'S LICENCES
reg_info.act_under: Highway Traffic Act   Code de la route

content.section: Renewal of licence if validity had been extended by O. Reg. 105/02
content.content: 1. A driving instructor’s licence whose term of validity was extended under Ontario Regulation 105/02 is not renewable unless the licence is renewed within one year of the expiry date referred to in subsection 8 (1) of Regulation 586 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990. O. Reg. 195/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A driving instructor’s licence whose term of validity was extended under Ontario Regulation 105/02 is not renewable unless the licence is renewed within one year of the expiry date referred to in subsection 8 (1) of Regulation 586 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990. O. Reg. 195/02, s. 1.

content.section: Renewal of licence if validity had been extended by O. Reg. 105/02
content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 195/02, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 195/02, s. 2.

content.section: Renewal of licence if validity had been extended by O. Reg. 105/02
content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 195/02, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 195/02, s. 3.
